title: Monarchs use art and science for power 1500-1800

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the ways in which European monarchs used both the arts and the sciences to enhance state power in the period circa 1500–1800.

frqParts.text:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the ways in which European monarchs used both the arts and the sciences to enhance state power in the period circa 1500–1800.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
